SectionBody.Text: As used in the Florida Criminal Code, the term “terrorism” means an activity that:

Paragraph.Text: Involves a violent act or an act dangerous to human life which is a violation of the criminal laws of this state or of the United States; or
Involves a violation of s. 815.06; and
Intimidate, injure, or coerce a civilian population;
Influence the policy of a government by intimidation or coercion; or
Affect the conduct of government through destruction of property, assassination, murder, kidnapping, or aircraft piracy.
